com.ibm.portal.resolver
Interface EventContext

All Superinterfaces:
AttributeContext, CookieContext, DigestContext, DigestProvider, HeaderContext, PortletContext
public interface EventContext
extends PortletContext

Extension of the COR PortletContext for use in a JSR168 portlet. This context is exposed during the event phase of a portlet.

Since:
8.0.0.1

Method Summary
 javax.portlet.EventRequest getRequest()
          Returns the JSR168 portlet request object associated with the context
 javax.portlet.EventResponse getResponse()
          Returns the JSR168 portlet response object associated with the context
